parameters: More statues of herself. These ones are intertwined with each other as they passionately make out. At this point, it hard to tell if this is vanity, or perversion.
More statues of herself. These ones are intertwined with each other as they passionately make out. At this point, it hard to tell if this is vanity, or perversion.

This picture depicts some sort of queen or princess. It looks absolutely nothing like Alexandra, but the plaque still says it’s her. Actually, the paint around her name is a slightly different shade\..\..\.. did she paint her name over this?
This might be the only thing in here that you don't have an insult for, it's just a nice painting of a city you don't recognize.
This might be the only thing in here that you don't have an insult for, it's just a nice painting of a city you don't recognize.
Seems like a fire hazard with this plush rug...
Everything in here follows the same color motif, except,\. this,\. wardrobe.
Everything in here follows the same color motif, except,\. this,\. wardrobe.
\fiAnother\fi piano? Is she really too lazy to just \figo\fi to where the piano is if she wants to play it? She needs one in every room?
You pick a book at random.
It's title reads, "How to take over the world."
Most of the books follow that theme.
You select a book at random.
It's title reads, "How to train your slave."
Most of the books follow that theme.
This thing is gathering dust. It's like the idea of having a bare stretch of wall was too much for her.
This thing is gathering dust. It's like the idea of having a bare stretch of wall was too much for her.
The bathroom is this way. It's comparably huge, but you've no reason to use it at the moment.
Her hugeass bed. It's really comfy, but there's a creepy as fuck painting of her in the back of it. It's eyes seem to track you.
Skip victory scene sequence? The game will treat the events as having occurred either way.
Just in case you hit this by accident, you're sure you want to skip it?
A table for tea. You have to assume the maids would be responsible for bringing it.
